activities:
Yodlee is a Software as a Service (SAAS) company that provides a range of servies on behalf of its clients.  Information from its clients is stored on Yodlee's servers.  During registration you are required to give contact information such as name, address and email address.  Once you have registered we will ask for your Mobile phone number so that you may receive SMS messages regarding your account transfers, account balances, and other account information that you inquire about. Your personal information will not be sold, shared, rented or traded with any affiliated or unaffiliated third parties, except (i) to provide you with the Yodlee MoneyCenter Services, (ii) pursuant to joint marketing arrangements described below, or (iii) as required or permitted by law.

Yodlee acts as a data processor to our institutional clients who offer our services to their consumers.  Information provided is handled per the same policies and processes to ensure compliance with applicable regulations and standards.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer financial and privacy data that is provided or collected to provide the Yodlee Services
